tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WasteCollectionEquipment (
  equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
  quantity INT,
  reorder_threshold INT
)

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_equipment (
    equipment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    equipment_type VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE reordering_history (
    reorder_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id UUID NOT NULL,
    reorder_date DATE NOT NULL,
    quantity_ordered INT NOT NULL,
    delivery_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_equipment (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    order_date DATE,
    quantity INT,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE equipment (
    equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name STRING,
    quantity INT,
    location STRING,
    last_maintenance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    order_date DATE,
    equipment_id INT,
    quantity_ordered INT,
    is_fulfilled BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_equipment (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name TEXT,
  quantity INT,
  last_reorder_date DATE,
  location TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE equipment_tracking (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  tracking_date DATE,
  location TEXT,
  status TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE equipment_reordering (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  reorder_date DATE,
  quantity_to_order INT,
  status TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE locations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name TEXT,
  address TEXT,
  contact_person TEXT,
  contact_number TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE equipment_usage (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  usage_date DATE,
  usage_duration INT,
  comments TEXT
);
